value.title: StarCraft 2: INNOVATION IS BACK - Amazing Series vs Dark! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: An amazing series of high level StarCraft 2 between INnoVation (Terran) and Dark (Zerg). INnoVation just came back from his military service in South Korea, and somehow is already back in form.
